name: init_fund
attributes: # [doc = " 募金用アカウントを初期化します（管理者のみ実行可）"]
body: let fund = & mut ctx . accounts . fund ;
fund . admin = ctx . accounts . admin . key () ;

name: donate
attributes: # [doc = " 任意のユーザーが募金（Lamports転送）できる"]
body: * * ctx . accounts . donor . to_account_info () . try_borrow_mut_lamports () ? -= amount ;
* * ctx . accounts . fund . to_account_info () . try_borrow_mut_lamports () ? += amount ;
let fund = & mut ctx . accounts . fund ;
fund . total_donations = fund . total_donations . checked_add (amount) . unwrap () ;
msg ! ("{} donated {} lamports (total: {})" , ctx . accounts . donor . key () , amount , fund . total_donations) ;

fields.name: fund
fields.attribute: # [account (init , payer = admin , space = 8 + 32 + 8 + 1 , seeds = [b"fund" , admin . key () . as_ref ()] , bump)]

fields.name: fund
fields.attribute: # [account (mut , seeds = [b"fund" , fund . admin . as_ref ()] , bump = fund . bump , has_one = admin @ ErrorCode :: Unauthorized)]

fields.name: donor
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 誰でも募金できるので署名のみチェック"] # [account (mut , signer)]

fields.name: admin
fields.attribute: # [doc = " Fund の所有者（管理者）は募金から除外していないが、参照用"]
